```
from math import *

m0 = 1000 #masa auta u kg
m = 72 #masa jednog covjeka u kg
s = 10 #udaljenost brijegova u m
v0 = 35 #brzina auta u km/h

#ovo ne treba mijenjat
mljudi = 4*m
muk = m0 + mljudi
v = v0/3.6
f = v/s
k = 4*(pi**2)*(f**2) * muk

x = (mljudi*9.81)/k
x *= 100
print("Karoserija automobila se podigne za ", x,"cm")
```
![](assets/2022-04-08/00007.png)

![](assets/2022-04-08/00008.png)
```
import math
k=10000
m=500
xmax = 0.4
t=0.9
w0 = math.sqrt(k/m)
v0 = math.e*w0*xmax

x = v0*t*math.pow(math.e, -w0*t)
print(x)
```

import math
